message.body: This is blowing my mind!
Pretty insane .
It's being listed with huge Hollywood films!
What the shit!
And beating them in China.
Amazing. Have you talked to peng??
Yes, via email, but not more than a few sentences.
A man of few words
I think he's pumped. He's starting his own company and this should really help him.
It seems like it would really kickstart a production company. Then he can employ us all
Exactly.
Hahahaha.
How's your application? You feel good?

Yeah! I rewrote my entire cover letter last night and it's really strong I think. I just need to rewrite the synopsis and add your bio (email me the bio you are currently using when you have a chance!)
If you have time if course!
My friend Ginny is gonna check it too
Of course. I'll send you my bio. You send me the app tomorrow and I will comb through it. Very exciting.
Thanks dude! Such a huge help. Do you think 50000 is a reasonable budget
Or is that like delusional?
I think it will be more, especially if you are able to get name actors, but I think that is not so important right now.
They ask for a range in the app. I initially thought 150,000 but toms Like YOU CAN DONIT FOR 50000
Haha.
I want Francis McDormand so...
I know! That would be incredible. She seems like the type of lady who would take less than normal for a project she really believes in.
She probably works for free.
Yeah now yr talkin
